DOC.brief_title: Long Term Effects Soft Splints Stroke Patients Patients With Disorders Consciousness
DOC.detailed_description: Patients stroke disorder consciousness ( DOC ) likely suffer major muscular trouble spasticity . This spasticity may induce pain , loss range motion permanent joint deformity . The aim study investigate effect soft splint hand spasticity patient stroke patient disorder consciousness . The investigator plan include 100 patient ( 50 stroke - 50 DOC ) subgroup divide two arm : one wear real soft splint ( 6 cm diameter ) three hour day 3 three week one wear 'placebo ' splint ( 1 cm diameter ) . Skin condition follow nursing team three week . Spasticity , pain consciousness assessment perform baseline ( week 0 ) , 1 week treatment ( week 1 ) end treatment ( week 3 ) , 1 week later ( week 4 ) , 3 week later ( week 6 ) three month later ( week 12 ) .
